duties_responsibilities.duty: Clean and sanitize assigned areas with attention to detail and food safety standards.
Possess knowledge of chemicals and chemical safety for cleaning chemicals.
Follow and execute cleaning schedules, utilizing power washers, hoses, and small hand and power tools.
Disassemble and reassemble equipment using hand and power tools.
Set up equipment and supplies for the next day’s production.
Report and scan materials issued into the company’s ERP system.
Comply with health and safety rules, procedures, laws, and accepted safe work practices.
Follow safety standards and report any unsafe acts, conditions, and injuries.
